headline: Show HN: Programmable network proxy for the cloud, edge and IoT
description: *Pipy* is an [open-source](https://github.com/flomesh-io/pipy), lightweight, high-performance, modular, programmable, cloud-native network stream processor that is ideal for a variety of use-cases like edge routers, load balancers & proxy solutions, API gateways, static HTTP servers, service mesh sidecars, policy agents, and other applications.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 用于云、边缘和物联网的可编程网络代理
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 用於雲、邊緣和物聯網的可編程網絡代理
description_zh-Hans: *Pipy*是一个[开源](https://github.com/flomesh-io/pipy)、轻量级、高性能、模块化、可编程、云原生网络流处理器，是边缘路由器、负载均衡器&代理解决方案、API网关、静态HTTP服务器、服务网状侧翼、策略代理和其他应用等各种用例的理想选择。
description_zh-Hant: *Pipy*是一個[開源](https://github.com/flomesh-io/pipy)、輕量級、高性能、模塊化、可編程、雲原生網絡流處理器，是邊緣路由器、負載均衡器&代理解決方案、API網關、靜態HTTP服務器、服務網狀側翼、策略代理和其他應用等各種用例的理想選擇。
